verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H1980>Depart,<s%> and go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H4480>hence,<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast brought <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Unto thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> it:

And I will <S%H7971>send<s%> an <S%H4397>angel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee; and I will drive <S%H1644>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzite,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite,<s%> and the Jebusite: <S%H2983><s%>

Unto <S%H413><s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I will <S%H3808>not<s%> go <S%H5927>up<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thee; <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art a <S%H7186>stiffnecked<s%> <S%H6203><s%> <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> I <S%H3615>consume<s%> thee in the <S%H1870>way.<s%>

And when the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>tidings,<s%> they <S%H56>mourned:<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> did <S%H7896>put<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> him his <S%H5716>ornaments.<s%>

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>Say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H859>Ye<s%> are a <S%H7186>stiffnecked<s%> <S%H6203><s%> <S%H5971>people:<s%> I will come <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thee in <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H7281>moment,<s%> and <S%H3615>consume<s%> thee: therefore <S%H6258>now<s%> put <S%H3381>off<s%> thy <S%H5716>ornaments<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee, that I may <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> unto thee.
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> stripped <S%H5337>themselves<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> their <S%H5716>ornaments<s%> by the <S%H4480>mount<s%> <S%H2022><s%> <S%H2722>Horeb.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle,<s%> and <S%H5186>pitched<s%> it <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> afar <S%H7368>off<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> it the <S%H168>Tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%> And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that every <S%H3605>one<s%> which <S%H1245>sought<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle,<s%> that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and <S%H5324>stood<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> at his <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H6607>door,<s%> and <S%H5027>looked<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he was <S%H935>gone<s%> into the <S%H168>tabernacle.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> entered <S%H935>into<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle,<s%> the <S%H6051>cloudy<s%> <S%H5982>pillar<s%> <S%H3381>descended,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle,<s%> and the LORD <S%H1696>talked<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6051>cloudy<s%> <S%H5982>pillar<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> at the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> <S%H6607>door:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> in his <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H6607>door.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H6440>face,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H7453>friend.<s%> And he turned <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4264>camp:<s%> but his <S%H8334>servant<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> a young <S%H5288>man,<s%> <S%H4185>departed<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H8432><s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H7200>See,<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H559>sayest<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, Bring <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people:<s%> and <S%H859>thou<s%> hast <S%H3808>not<s%> let me <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> thou wilt <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> me. Yet <S%H859>thou<s%> hast <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> thee by <S%H8034>name,<s%> and thou hast <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight,<s%> <S%H3045>show<s%> me <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1870>way,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> I may <S%H3045>know<s%> thee, that I may <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight:<s%> and <S%H7200>consider<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> is thy <S%H5971>people.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> My <S%H6440>presence<s%> shall <S%H1980>go<s%> with thee, and I will give thee <S%H5117>rest.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H518>If<s%> thy <S%H6440>presence<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H369>not<s%> with me, carry us not <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H408><s%> <S%H4480>hence.<s%> <S%H2088><s%>

For <S%H4100>wherein<s%> shall it be <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H645>here<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> and thy <S%H5971>people<s%> have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight?<s%> is it <S%H3808>not<s%> in that thou <S%H1980>goest<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> us? so shall we be <S%H6395>separated,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> and thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> from <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou hast <S%H1696>spoken:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thou hast <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight,<s%> and I <S%H3045>know<s%> thee by <S%H8034>name.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I beseech <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H7200>show<s%> <S%H853>me<s%> thy <S%H3519>glory.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> will make <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H2898>goodness<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee, and I will <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee; and will be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> <S%H853><s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> I will be <S%H2603>gracious,<s%> and will show <S%H7355>mercy<s%> <S%H853><s%> on <S%H834>whom<s%> I will show <S%H7355>mercy.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Thou <S%H3201>canst<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H6440>face:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> there shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> me, and <S%H2425>live.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> there is a <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H854>by<s%> me, and thou shalt <S%H5324>stand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> a rock: <S%H6697><s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> while my <S%H3519>glory<s%> passeth <S%H5674>by,<s%> that I will <S%H7760>put<s%> thee in a <S%H5366>cleft<s%> of the <S%H6697>rock,<s%> and will <S%H5526>cover<s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee with my <S%H3709>hand<s%> <S%H5704>while<s%> I pass by: <S%H5674><s%>

And I will take <S%H5493>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> mine <S%H3709>hand,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> my back <S%H268>parts:<s%> but my <S%H6440>face<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H7200>seen.<s%>
